SMA_TrendFollow.description: Trend following strategies with moving average analysis

CPR_SMA_CALL.entry: (close > cpr_r1) & (close > previous_day_high) & (close > sma_9) & (sma_9 > sma_20) & (sma_9 > sma_50) & (sma_9 > sma_200) & (close > previous_candle_high) & (ltp_high > high)

CPR_SMA_PUT.description: Multi-SMA trend entry (9>20>50>200), exit on close < SMA20
CPR_SMA_PUT.entry: (close < cpr_s1) & (close < previous_day_low) & (close < sma_9) & (sma_9 < sma_20) & (sma_9 < sma_50) & (sma_9 < sma_200) & (close < previous_candle_high) & (ltp_low < low)

EMA_TrendFollow.description: Trend following strategies with moving average analysis

CPR_EMA_CALL.entry: (close > previous_day_high) & (close > cpr_r1) & (close > ema_9) & (ema_9 > ema_20) & (ema_20 > ema_50) & (ema_50 > ema_200) & (previous_candle_close > previous_candle_open) & (close > previous_candle_high) & (close > open)

CPR_EMA_PUT.description: Multi-SMA trend entry (9>20>50>200), exit on close < SMA20
CPR_EMA_PUT.entry: (close < previous_day_low) &  (close < cpr_s1) & (close < ema_9) & (ema_9 < ema_20) & (ema_20 < ema_50) & (ema_50 < ema_200) & (previous_candle_close < previous_candle_open) & (close < previous_candle_low) & (close < open)

RSI_Reversal.description: Mean reversion strategies using RSI and moving averages

RSI_Bounce_Call.description: RSI oversold bounce, call when RSI < 30 and crosses above

RSI_Drop_Put.description: RSI overbought drop, put when RSI > 70 and reverses

Breakout.description: Breakout strategies using VWAP and momentum

VWAP_Breakout_Call.description: Price breaks above VWAP, with momentum

VWAP_Breakdown_Put.description: Price breaks below VWAP, with weakness
